ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'Did we not forbid you to play host to anyone at all?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Did we not restrain you," they said, "from (entertaining) creatures from the outside world?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They replied: "Did we not forbid you again and again to extend hospitality to all and sundry?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They replied, "Did we not forbid you to bring anyone to your house?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “Had we not forbidden you from meddling in the affairs of anyone?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "Did we not forbid you from entertaining any of the `Alamin"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Have we not forbidden you from (other) people?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Have we not forbidden thee all beings?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said; Have we not forbidden you from (entertaining) anyone?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "Did we not forbid you to extend hospitality to strangers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: forbade we not thee against the worlds?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Did we not forbid you from [defending ] strangers?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "Did we not forbid thee (to speak) for all and sundry?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They (people of the city) said: "Did we not forbid you to entertain (or protect) any of the 'Alamin (people, foreigners, strangers, etc. from us)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'Have we not forbidden you (the people of) the worlds'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “Did we not forbid you from strangers?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:70] They said, ‘Have we not forbidden you from [entertaining] anyone?’, from offering them hospitality?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: Have we not forbidden you) Lot (from (entertaining) anyone?) from welcoming any strangers as guests.
